titles.title: O for a Thousand Tongues to Sing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O for a thousand tongues to sing My dear Redeemer's praise, The glories of my God and King, The triumphs of His grace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My gracious Master and my God, Assist me to proclaim, To spread thro' all the earth abroad, The honors of Thy name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus! the name that charms our fears, That bids our sorrows cease; 'Tis music in the sinner's ears, 'Tis life, and health, and peace.
